    • DrawableRectangle

      public DrawableRectangle​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, java.awt.Color color)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      x1 - x coordinate of south-west rectangle corner, origin x
      y1 - y coordinate of south-west rectangle corner, origin y
      x2 - x coordinate of north-east rectangle corner
      y2 - y coordinate of north-east rectangle corner
      color - color of the rectangle
